features: Wireless Freedom: Enjoy the freedom of movement with our microphone for Android phone. Record from a distance of up to 65 feet (unobstructed), catering to your recording needs in various settings without the hassle of cables.

Noise-Free Recording: Our USB C microphone features a DSP noise reduction chip, automatically cancelling unwanted background noise for crystal-clear video audio. The 2.4GHz technology ensures stable audio transmission, keeps your voice in sync.

Extended Working Hours: A single Android microphone provides 5-6 hours of continuous usage on a single charge. When using two lavalier mic interchangeably, enjoy approximately 12 hours of uninterrupted recording. Forget about battery concerns, and you can even charge your devices through the wireless receiver port.

Versatility at its Best: The wireless lavalier microphone compatible with iPhone 15, iPhone, 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, most Android smartphones except Samsung Galaxy A03s and Moto G Stylus 5G, laptops and computers—a game-changer for video recording, interviews, and live streaming. Note: Enable the "OTG" function on your device before using the mini usb c microphone.

The wireless microphone Android is the ideal tool for those seeking wireless convenience and capturing crystal-clear audio. The mini microphone android has a one-year warranty, and our service team is ready to assist with any inquiries.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep your voice in sync Wireless lavalier microphone for Android with 2.4 GHz transmission technology and ultra-low latency that keeps your picture matching your voice. Focus on your voice The wireless USB C microphone automatically eliminates ambient noise and improves video quality. Rechargeable Microphone for Phone Android Delivering 6 hours of use per charge. You can charge your device through the receiver while recording. NOTE: The receiver does not need to be charged. Good Ideal for Vlogging, Live Streaming This mini microphone android provide clear and crisp sound. In special situations, mute it with a quick press once of the power key. The android microphone will not mute your device while in use.

Andriod Phone Setting Enable OTG function on your phone before recording This function is allows the phone to connect wireless clip on microphone directly. When android phone's camera App doesn't support USB C microphone, please download "Open Camera" App. Item not compatible with Samsung Galaxy A03s or Moto G Stylus 5G. PC & Laptop Setting Select the USB Audio 1.0 as default sound input. Some PCs & Laptops devices use the built-in microphone by default. If the wireless lapel microphone and receiver indicators both are solid but not working, please try this method.

Plug in the wireless receiver The Red light on receiver flashes Power on the lapel microphone The usb c microphone will auto paire the receiver Star to create Wireless microphone for android is good for audio & video recording, live streaming and vlogging What will you get Package includes 2 wireless lavalier microphones, 1 receiver, 1 USB adapter, 1 extra mic cover, 1 charging cable, and 1 user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Christmas Gift of the Year
reviews.reviewText: I told my husband about these mini mics, and he came through for Christmas. The sound quality is UNBELIEVABLE for something so small and easy to use. You plug them in and they work. It's that simple! And when I record with a house full of children, the children are cancelled out like magic. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far I've used these for about 3 total hours worth of recording. Of course they aren't top tier, but they are very close to it. The Bluetooth connects quickly, the sound is very good, and I haven't had to charge it yet. As far as sound quality, I have to edit way less than cell phone audio. I have an S23 Ultra, and these sound better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The audio quality of the mic is very smooth without any interruptions or echo. Very handy and easy to clip on to your clothes.. highly recommended for recording audios thru phone!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Clip on Microphone! Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for Social Media purposes. The microphones are easy to use and I love that the adaptor can go through either the cellphone or your computer. I used my computer so I had a safety recording on the cell phone as a backup and I have needed it in a few instances. The noise cancelling is very good. My daughter was putting hard plastic pieces onto another hard plastic and the microphone did not pick it up. However, the noise cancelling feature made it difficult to record if the voice being recorded got too loud with a shout of excitement or talking loud in excitement. Thankfully, this did not happen often but it's a drawback. However, I am thankful for my purchase because overall, it is a very good product. Now that I know the limitations under certain circumstances, I can change how I do my recordings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, bought for my yeenage daughter. Works great and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall a good product but may not be suitable for Content Creators
reviews.reviewText: The device works properly, came in great condition, looks great and is a great product for general small projects. However, I'm a content creator and was looking for something that provides better audio quality than my phone and, unfortunately, I was not able to use it for my videos, since it makes it sound like I'm somewhat distant or under water slightly...when compared to the audio quality of my phone. To be fair, I may need a $100-200 mic for the type of work I do but wanted to try a less expensive option. Again, overall it's a great quality product, but not ideal for content creators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a gift for my daughter to do her blogs. She loves them! She's clearly heard in all of her videos, and they're easy to use. Great choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great set of microphones
reviews.reviewText: This mic slaps. It's got everything you need and is super affordable. Also the range is great- walked 50 ft away from the source and it still picked up our voices.Would highly recommend.
